parameters.name: DeliveryNameLike
parameters.description: The name of the log delivery configuration. Fuzzy queries are supported.

parameters.name: DeliveryType
parameters.description:
The type of the log delivery configuration that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **syslog**: Logs are delivered to a syslog service.
*   **kafka**: Logs are delivered to a Kafka service.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the Web Application Firewall (WAF) instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstance](~~433756~~) operation to query the ID of the WAF instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the WAF instance. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: the Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1**: outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: ResourceManagerResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud resource group.
